content.raw:
@jayhesselberth I found it!
[https://storage.googleapis.com/google-code-attachments/segway-genome/issue-27/comment-4/slurm.py](https://storage.googleapis.com/google-code-attachments/segway-genome/issue-27/comment-4/slurm.py)

I had to use this as reference:
https://code.google.com/archive/schema

It's fairly barebones though and I cannot verify if it will work or not. If anyone manages to get it to work we should probably just add it in.
